intro: Ruschia atrata, commonly known as the darkleaf Ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its compact, mat-forming growth habit and succulent, gray-green leaves. Its small, star-shaped flowers are typically pink or purple, appearing in spring. Ruschia atrata is well adapted to arid environments, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
